Class MyCanvas

RobotProjectGUI.MyCanvas
public class MyCanvas extends Object

    • showWheel

      public void showWheel(double x, double y, double width, double height, char col)
      Show the wheel on canvas, colour defined with col.
      Parameters:
      x - Wheel's x position from one of the corners.
      y - Wheel's x position from one of the corners.
      width - Wheel's width.
      height - Wheel's height.
      col - Wheel's colour.

    • showWheel

      public void showWheel(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Show the wheel with the current colour at the position specified.
      Parameters:
      x - Wheel's x position from one of the corners.
      y - Wheel's x position from one of the corners.
      width - Wheel's width.
      height - Wheel's height.

    • showRobot

      public void showRobot(double x, double y, double height, double width, double rad, double angle, char col)
      Presents robot onto canvas, done so as a body and two wheels. Starts with setting robot as the origin for rotation, adds robot while it is rotated and restores the canvas' changes.
      Parameters:
      x - Robot's x position.
      y - Robot's y position.
      h - Robot's wheel height.
      w - Robot's wheel width.
      rad - Robot's radius.
      angle - Robot's angle.
      col - Robot's colour.

    • showWhiskerRobot

      public void showWhiskerRobot(double x, double y, double height, double width, double rad, double angle, char col)
      Presents whisker robot onto canvas, similar to robot but with whiskers.
      Parameters:
      x - Robot's x position.
      y - Robot's y position.
      h - Robot's wheel height.
      w - Robot's wheel width.
      rad - Robot's radius.
      angle - Robot's angle.
      col - Robot's colour.
